full_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Kettlebell 6kg, Black & White Premium Kettle Bell with Smooth Seamless Handle & Stable Flat Base for Home Gym Equipment and Strength Training

reasoning.keyword_integration: Woven 'kettlebell' (26K searches), 'cast iron kettlebell' (5K searches), '6kg kettlebell' (7.5K searches), and 'home gym equipment' (3.7K searches) naturally into descriptive phrases. Used verified color 'black, white' and key features like 'smooth seamless handle' and 'stable flat base' from product facts.
